basicAuth.description:
Basic authentication with Conjur username and password (users only)
or API key (hosts and users).

conjurAuth.description: Conjur access token in `Token token=<base64_encoded_token>` format.
conjurAuth.name: Authorization

conjurKubernetesMutualTls.description:
Conjur Kubernetes authenticator mutual TLS authentication.
To authenticate using this method, you must provide a trusted client
certificate

apiDescription: This is an API definition for CyberArk Conjur Open Source. You can find out more at [Conjur.org](https://www.conjur.org/).
